options.name: Fledgling Combatant
options.description: You have trained with several types of melee weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex melee weapons.

options.name: Action : Power Strike
options.description: You make a powerful attack against an enemy with a simple or complex melee weapon that consumes a lot of energy, adding 2 might dice to your weapon attack. These dice are not eligible for critical hits.

options.name: Action : Close the Gap
options.description: You move up to 2 units towards an enemy and then make an attack against them with a melee weapon.

options.name: Reaction : Reactive Strike
options.description: When an enemy moves within your melee range, make an attack against them with a simple or complex melee weapon.

options.name: Conditioning
options.description: Your dedication to weapon training has resulted in increased conditioning. You gain +1 skill with fitness and +2 maximum health.

options.name: Parry
options.description: You have trained to block attacks with your weapons. You gain +1 skill with deflection.

options.name: Skilled Combatant
options.description: You have trained with several types of melee weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex melee weapons.

options.name: Brutal Criticals
options.description: When you score any number of critical hits on a simple or complex melee weapon attack, add 5 damage to the final calculation.

options.name: Talented Combatant
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with simple and complex melee weapons.
